== MainInclusionReportRadeontool ==

== Main inclusion report for radeontool ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/r/radeontool

2. ''Rationale:'' This package is required in order to switch off the backlight on some Thinkpads

3. ''Security:'' No known security issues. Run as root.

4. ''QA:'' Intended to be run via acpi-support on certain Thinkpads which otherwise fail to switch off the backlight

5. ''Standards compliance:'' Debhelpered package, appears to meet FHS and policy

6. ''Dependencies:'' None

=== Reviewers ===
MartinPitt: does not work at all for my Radeon 9200 and has a scary description; ok security-wise, though, so approved.
